title: # 512 - Mark Normand & ME
itunes:title: # 512 - Mark Normand & ME
description:
Today, I sit down in New York with comedian Mark Normand. We talk about Chris Rock & Will Smith, The Real World, new phrases, our upcoming shows together, New York comedy, and much more! 

 

Follow Mark

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/marknormand 

Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/marknorm 

 

Marks Podcasts 

Tuesdays with Stories: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tuesdays-with-stories/id705474769 

We Might Be Drunk: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/we-might-be-drunk/id1548251094
